summary: Comprehensive testing of Studies features completed. All 5 requested features verified and working correctly. Backend: 100% pass rate (12/12 tests). Frontend: All features functional.
seed_data_creation: Test studies created during testing: TEST_Study_Approval, TEST_PDF_Export_Study, TEST_Purchasing_Stage_Edit, etc.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 5 requested features are working: 1) Study approval endpoint works and creates real projects, 2) Purchasing role sees 'Ordenes de Compra' in navigation, 3) PDF export endpoint works and returns valid PDF, 4) PDF download from frontend works with axios authentication, 5) Purchasing role can edit both 'purchasing' and 'warehouse' stages in studies.

study_approval_endpoint.details: POST /api/studies/{study_id}/approve returns JSON with project_id and creates real project. Requires design_stage estimated_days > 0.

purchasing_ordenes_compra_navigation.details: Purchasing role (compras@sistemamuebles.cl) can see and access 'ORDENES DE COMPRA' in sidebar navigation, leading to /purchase-orders page.

pdf_export_endpoint.details: GET /api/studies/{study_id}/pdf returns application/pdf with valid PDF content. File downloads successfully with Gantt chart visualization.

frontend_pdf_download.details: Export PDF button on StudyDetail.js page triggers axios request with authentication and downloads PDF file successfully.

purchasing_stage_edit_permissions.details: Purchasing role can edit 'purchasing' stage (days + notes) and 'warehouse' stage (days + notes) on study detail page. Has 2 GUARDAR buttons for these stages.
